entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
